tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_content (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ar_model BYTEA,
    ar_texture BYTEA,
    ar_metadata JSONB,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_content (
    content_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    content_description TEXT,
    content_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_assets (
    asset_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_description TEXT,
    asset_location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_id UUID REFERENCES augmented_reality_content(content_id)
);

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_content (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  type VARCHAR(50),
  content BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_assets (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  asset_name VARCHAR(50),
  asset_type VARCHAR(50),
  asset_file BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE user_permissions (
  user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  content_access BOOLEAN,
  asset_access BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ar_content (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(50),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    content_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_assets (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(50),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    asset_url TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_users (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    password_hash TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE ar_permissions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content_id INT,
    permission_level INT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE augmented_reality_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_description TEXT,
    content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    content_url TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE content_assets (
    asset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT NOT NULL,
    asset_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    asset_url TEXT NOT NULL,
    asset_size INT
);
